summary.span: 提供 控制項的 事件的資料。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓您的新值無效時，取消目前儲存格的變更。The event lets you cancel changes to the current cell when the new value is not valid. 使用屬性來判斷目前的值。Use the property to determine the current value. 若要判斷目前的儲存格的狀態，請使用和屬性，以存取透過儲存格集合。To determine the state of the current cell, use the and properties to access the cell through the collection. 若要取消變更，將屬性`true`。To cancel the change, set the property to `true`. 此事件在資料繫結模式取消時，新的值不會發送到基礎資料來源。When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source. 當此事件會在虛擬模式中，取消不會引發事件。When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the event will not be raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件以確保使用者所輸入的只是正整數。The following code example handles the event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic.
